String.Value: Hello. What can I do for you?
Perhaps I can offer you something you are looking for?
How many would you like?
Come back when you can afford it.
Sorry, I don't have what you've requested.
What are you selling?
How many do you want to sell?
I'll give you $GOLD coins for $QUANTITY. Deal?
Sorry. I don't know what happened.
You don't have that manyâ€¦?
What needs to be repaired?
I'll need $REPAIRAMT gold coins to fix that. Ok?
Well... That will be $REPAIRAMT gold coins. Do you still want to do it?
Come back when you have money.
It is done.
What do you wish to forget?
This is what you may learn.
What do you wish to forget?
$SKILLNAME, $SKILLDESC. Hopefully you will use it well.
To learn $SKILLNAME, $REQS will have to be presented. Do you want to do that?
To learn $SKILLNAME you must be level $LEVEL or greater.
To learn $SKILLNAME, $PREREQ must be level $LEVEL or greater.
You lack the physical requirements to learn $SKILLNAME. $STATS
Come back when you have the correct fee.
Come back when you have the items that I seek.
It is done.
$SPELLNAME, $SPELLDESC. Hopefully you will use it well.
To learn $SPELLNAME, $REQS and $GOLD have to be presented to me. Do you want to do that?
To learn $SPELLNAME you must be insight $LEVEL or greater.
To learn $SPELLNAME, $PREREQ must be level $LEVEL or greater.
You lack the physical fortitude to learn $SPELLNAME. $STATS
Return when you have the coin.
Return when you have what I require.
It is done.
Let it trouble you no more.
What do you wish to send?
To whom do you want this parcel sent?
You've given $FEE coins. It will be done.
I need $FEE coins for postage; $FEE coins!
Let me see... ah yes, here it is.
